summary: Contoso Wireless offers payment plans for its phones, tablets, and accessories. Customers can choose from 6-month, 12-month, and 24-month payment plans depending on the product they purchase. All of these plans require a down payment at the time of purchase and the remaining balance is split into equal payments over the course of the agreed upon period. If customers have any questions about the payment plans, they can contact Contoso Wireless for more information.
